id1.name: Apple
id1.description: Apples are known for their sweet and tart taste, and come in a variety of colors and sizes depending on the variety. Apples are also known for their nutritional value, as they are a good source of fiber, vitamin C, and antioxidants.

id2.name: Banana
id2.description: Bananas are known for their yellow color, sweet taste, and soft texture. They are a good source of carbohydrates, fiber, vitamins, and minerals.

id3.name: Strawberry
id3.description: Strawberries are known for their bright red color, juicy texture, and sweet, slightly tart taste. In addition to their taste, strawberries are also a good source of vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants.

nutritions.Vitamin C: 113% of the Daily Value (DV) per cup

id4.name: Orange
id4.description: They are known for their bright orange color, sweet taste, and juicy texture. Oranges are a good source of vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants.
